description: Provides a list of your parallel data resources in Amazon Translate.

nested_items.name: ParallelDataPropertiesList
nested_items.description: The properties of the parallel data resources returned by this request.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The custom name assigned to the parallel data resource.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the parallel data resource.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description assigned to the parallel data resource.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the parallel data resource. When the parallel data is ready for you to use, the status is ACTIVE.

nested_items.name: SourceLanguageCode
nested_items.description: The source language of the translations in the parallel data file.

nested_items.name: TargetLanguageCodes
nested_items.description: The language codes for the target languages available in the parallel data file. All possible target languages are returned as an array.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ParallelDataConfig
nested_items.description: Specifies the format and S3 location of the parallel data input file.

nested_items.name: S3Uri
nested_items.description: The URI of the Amazon S3 folder that contains the parallel data input file. The folder must be in the same Region as the API endpoint you are calling.

nested_items.name: Format
nested_items.description: The format of the parallel data input file.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: Additional information from Amazon Translate about the parallel data resource.

nested_items.name: ImportedDataSize
nested_items.description: The number of UTF-8 characters that Amazon Translate imported from the parallel data input file. This number includes only the characters in your translation examples. It does not include characters that are used to format your file. For example, if you provided a Translation Memory Exchange (.tmx) file, this number does not include the tags.

nested_items.name: ImportedRecordCount
nested_items.description: The number of records successfully imported from the parallel data input file.

nested_items.name: FailedRecordCount
nested_items.description: The number of records unsuccessfully imported from the parallel data input file.

nested_items.name: SkippedRecordCount
nested_items.description: The number of items in the input file that Amazon Translate skipped when you created or updated the parallel data resource. For example, Amazon Translate skips empty records, empty target texts, and empty lines.

nested_items.name: EncryptionKey
nested_items.description: The encryption key used to encrypt this object.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of encryption key used by Amazon Translate to encrypt this object.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the encryption key being used to encrypt this object.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the parallel data resource was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the parallel data resource was last updated.

nested_items.name: LatestUpdateAttemptStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the most recent update attempt for the parallel data resource.

nested_items.name: LatestUpdateAttemptAt
nested_items.description: The time that the most recent update was attempted.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The string to use in a subsequent request to get the next page of results in a paginated response. This value is null if there are no additional pages.
